CS:GO is certainly my favorite competitive shooter of all time, and overall the game I've put the most hours into. No doubt this is thanks to tight gameplay, accurate controls, and mechanics which can be improved upon for a near eternity. Matchmaking works surprisingly well with high enough trust-factor, and I can't remember the last time I played against an obvious hacker. The devs have also been frequently updating the game for a while, with largely quality updates. Any people that complain about  gameplay and responsiveness at this point really need to just blame their internet or computers because the game behaves great all the time from my experience. If anything, I hate that you have to restart the game in order to restore sound if you accidentally unplug your headphone preamp. 

Great stuff from Valve here boys.

Игра хорошая(за исключением багов которые появляются после обновлений)., играю в эту игру уже на протяжении нескольких лет, игра проста в понимании как и любой шутер в принципе.  Так же есть скины на оружия.  Игра оставляет кучу эмоций как негативных так и положительных. Вообще не затянуло))))
